Eduardo Canto

Undergraduate
Email
ecantoobfuscate@mit.edu

I am a first-year student from Puerto Rico majoring in Chemistry and Biology at MIT. As an undergraduate researcher and aspiring pre-med student (interested in oncodermatology), I like to learn about the RNA processes and how some defects can lead to dangerous consequences.

Outside the lab you may find me cheering for Real Madrid (even though this is definitely not our year), eating or psetting.
